mapper.sql: c.id, c.kee as kee, c.name as name, c.parent_id as parentId, c.characteristic_order as characteristicOrder, c.enabled as enabled, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO characteristics (kee, name, parent_id, characteristic_order, enabled, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{kee}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{characteristicOrder}, #{enabled}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)
mapper.update: update characteristics set name=#{name}, parent_id=#{parentId}, characteristic_order=#{characteristicOrder}, enabled=#{enabled}, updated_at=current_timestamp where id=#{id}
update characteristics set enabled=${_false}, updated_at=current_timestamp where id=#{id}
